item.title: [DELTA] Gambling
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Oh alright! So like;

[code=java]public static int chest[] = {0, 1079, 1093, 1127, 2615, 2617, 3478, 3479, 3480, 3481, 3483, 3485, 3486, 3488, 985, 987, 2366, 2368, 4587, 4608, 7158, 6889, 6540};

    public static int randomChest()        
    {            
            return chest[(int)(Math.random()*chest.length)];        
    }[/code]

This is it I believe?

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Gambling
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

mista pnut:

Well, how do I define it? Help me on TV if that’d be easier then explaining it?

If we were to do it for you, you wouldn’t learn anything.

You simply have to define a method (like any other method).

Judging from the name of the method, it should probably return a random int defined in an array. Something like

return chestItems[(int) (Math.random() * chestItems.length + 1)];

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Gambling
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Okay, I’m using this tutorial:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,483051.0.html

And I got to the second step, when you add this code:

if(objectID == 2417){ if(playerHasItem(989, 1)) { deleteItem(989, 1); addItem(Item.randomChest(), 1); addItem(4740, misc.random(35)); sM("You search the chest and find some items!"); resetPos(); } else sM("You Need A Crystal Key To Use This Chest!"); }

and I get this error when I compile:

Any help? I feel like it’s something small… :\

Read full topic
